article_metadata.title: Feds give Kentucky $1.8 million to treat heroin addiction | McClatchy DC

og.description: Five Kentucky clinics will get a total of $1.8 million to combat addiction to heroin and prescription painkillers, the U.S. Department of Health and Human Services announced Friday.
